Article 3: ‘high priority significant grid user’ means the significant grid user for which special conditions apply for disconnection andre-energisation;
‘high priority significant grid user’ means the significant grid user for which special conditions apply for disconnection and re-energisation;
Article 4: the list of high priority significant grid users referred to in Articles 11(4)(d) and 23(4)(d) or the principles applied to define those and the terms and conditions for disconnecting and re-energising the high priority grid users, unless defined by the national legislation of Member States.
Article 11: the specific needs of the high priority significant grid users listed pursuant to point (d) of paragraph 4; and
